definition: crew neck/round neck (of pull-over garment, e.g. T-shirt)
circle/round/circular/spherical/(of the moon) full/unit of Chinese currency (yuan)/tactful/to make consistent and whole (the narrative of a dream or a lie)
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc

sentences.english: Imported. overview Supersoft and comfortable french rib knit cotton crewneck.
sentences.chinese: 概述超软，舒适的法国罗纹针织棉圆领。

sentences.english: The collar was a high band with a white cotton sash tied in a big flamboyant bow at the neck.
sentences.chinese: 圆领，白色纯棉领巾在脖子处打成一个华丽的大领结。

sentences.english: I like the tee shirts without a collar.
I hope my T-shirt’s story has done just that.
sentences.chinese: 我希望我的圆领衫故事起到了这种作用。

sentences.english: Her nipples were clearly outlined-where they pressed against the cotton T-shirt.
sentences.chinese: 她的圆领衫绷紧处两个奶头轮廓鲜明。

sentences.english: Round neck, sleeveless frilled top in four layers and floral print.
sentences.chinese: 圆领无袖印花布上衣，以多层打褶式设计。

sentences.english: White round neck long sleeve T-shirt with pink 'Broken Heart' graphic.
sentences.chinese: 圆领与桃红色心形图案设计的长袖恤杉。

sentences.english: Crew necks are for squares and Mormons.
sentences.chinese: 圆领衫是给“飞机场”和摩门教徒穿的。

sentences.english: Curve cutting of small round neck set the most suitable girl fashion dress.
sentences.chinese: 曲线剪裁的小圆领的套装等最适合少女前卫性穿。

sentences.english: I also like the blue T-shirt with the round neck.
sentences.chinese: 我也喜欢那件蓝色圆领T恤衫。

sentences.english: It has a round collar with lovely lace.
sentences.chinese: 在它的圆领上点缀著可爱的蕾丝边。

sentences.english: Sandy, why are you wearing that old T-shirt It's disgusting.
sentences.chinese: 牙。桑迪呀，你怎么穿起那件旧圆领衫了？

sentences.english: Okay, just come here and look at this turtleneck sweater.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，过来看看这件圆领毛衣。

sentences.english: Sweatshirts and sweaters with a turtleneck and a lighter jacket are a good option.
sentences.chinese: 圆领运动衫和毛线衫，以及轻型夹克都是不错的选择。

sentences.english: Contrast ribbed crew neck and armholes.
sentences.chinese: 对比度带肋圆领和袖孔。
